      • closestIntersectionToStartOfLine

        public Point closestIntersectionToStartOfLine(Rectangle rec)
        If this line does not intersect with the rectangle, return null. Otherwise, return the closest intersection point to the start of the line.
        Parameters:
        rec - the rectangle to find intersections with
        Returns:
        the closest intersection point to the start of the line or null
